short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens search results/top results from Amazon, FlipKart, Ebay. Adds products directly to cart, only for Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens search results/top results from Amazon, FlipKart, Ebay at a single go. User can open results from these e-commerce sites in a single click and compare prices.
Adds products directly to cart, only for Amazon.

Works best in Desktops/Laptops.
